import{Breadcrumbs,Typography}from'@mui/material';import{Box,styled}from'@mui/system';import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import NavLink from'./styledComponent/NavLink';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var BreadcrumbsContainer=function BreadcrumbsContainer(){var BreadcrumbsText=styled(Typography)({fontSize:'smaller',':hover':{fontSize:'inherit'}});var location=useLocation();var currentLink='';var pos=0;//creo arr de crumbs separando donde hay '/' y exceptuando 'home' y '' 
var crumbs=location.pathname.split('/').filter(function(crumb){return crumb!=='home'&&crumb!=='';});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{component:"div",sx:{m:crumbs.length>0&&1},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Breadcrumbs,{separator:"|",sx:{alignItems:'flex-end'},children:[crumbs.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{underline:"hover",color:"inherit",to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BreadcrumbsText,{fontSize:"smaller",children:"home"})}),crumbs.map(function(section,i){currentLink+="/".concat(section);pos++;if(pos===crumbs.length){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BreadcrumbsText,{textTransform:"uppercase",children:section},i);}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{underline:"hover",color:"inherit",to:currentLink,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BreadcrumbsText,{fontSize:"smaller",children:section})},i);}})]})});};export default BreadcrumbsContainer;
